columns.name: partitionDate
columns.description:
Depending on the INTERVAL selected the partition date could be weekly, monthly or pay period end date. This is "as of a specific date."
Note : Only one value is permitted. The available options are: 
 "Weekly-Monday",
  "Weekly-Tuesday",
  "Weekly-Wednesday",
  "Weekly-Thursday",
  "Weekly-Friday",
  "Weekly-Saturday",
  "Weekly-Sunday",
  "Monthly-Begin",
  "Monthly-End",
  "Pay-Period-End"
For example, if "Weekly-Monday", is selected, the partitionDate will reference any date that falls on a Monday. This is date as of which all the other metrics and attributes in this view are calculated.

columns.name: personId
columns.description: Person Identifier

columns.name: accrualCodeId
columns.description: Accrual Code Identifier

columns.name: currencyCode
columns.description: Currency code for the amounts . Currency code for the current, probation, planned, pending, taking, earned or available amounts.

columns.name: currentBalVestedDays
columns.description:
Vested refers to balances earned or otherwise accrued.
Vested Balance Days as of the partitionDate. In this example if the partiotionDate is 8/22, Vested Days as of 8/22.

columns.name: currentBalVestedHrs
columns.description: Vested Balance Hours as of the partitionDate. In this example if the partiotionDate is 8/22,  Vested hours as of 8/22.

columns.name: currentBalVestedAmt
columns.description: Vested Balance Amount as of the partitionDate. In this example if the partiotionDate is 8/22,  Vested amount as of 8/22.

columns.name: currentBalProbationDays
columns.description: Accrued balances Days  for Probation type accrual code. Balances in Days

columns.name: currentBalProbationHrs
columns.description: Accrued balances hours for Probation type accrual code. Balances in Hours

columns.name: currentBalProbationAmt
columns.description: Accrued balances  amounts for Probation type accrual code. Balances in Amounts

columns.name: availableBalDays
columns.description: Balance or remainig days as of the partition date  In this example currentBalVestedDays as of 8/22,  minus the plannedTakingDays as 8/22 , minus the takingToDateDays as of 8/22.

columns.name: availableBalHrs
columns.description: Balance or remainig hours as of the partition date

columns.name: availableBalAmt
columns.description: Balance or remainig amount as of the partition date

columns.name: earnedToDateDays
columns.description: The number of days earned as of the partitionDate. If using an  accrual policy which involves for example accruing vacation for every day or hour worked, then earned will be the days of vacation accrued as of the partitionDate

columns.name: earnedToDateHrs
columns.description: The number of hours earned as of the partitionDate

columns.name: earnedToDateAmt
columns.description: The amount earned as of the partitionDate.

columns.name: pendingGrantDays
columns.description: Days which will accrue after the partitionDate. For example vacation days earned after 8/22 are considered as Pending as of 8/22.

columns.name: pendingGrantHrs
columns.description: Hours which will accrue after the partitionDate.

columns.name: pendingGrantAmt
columns.description: Amounts which will accrue after the partitionDate.

columns.name: plannedTakingDays
columns.description: Days scheduled to be taken or used after the current partition date. For example, vacation days that are  scheduled to be taken after current partion date, 8/22. These are considered to be planned but not yet taken.

columns.name: plannedTakingHrs
columns.description: Hours scheduled to be taken or used after the current partition date.

columns.name: plannedTakingAmt
columns.description: Amounts scheduled to be taken or used after the current partition date.

columns.name: takingToDateDays
columns.description: Days already taken or used as of the current partition date. For example, vacation days before current partion date, 8/22.

columns.name: takingToDateHrs
columns.description: Hours already taken or used as of the current partition date.

columns.name: takingToDateAmt
columns.description: Amounts already taken or used as of the current partition date.

columns.name: uniqueId
columns.description: Concatenation of Employee ID and Accrual Code. This will uniquely identify each record

columns.name: updateDtm
columns.description: The UTC date/time stamp of when the row was inserted or updated in BigQuery
